name: Dark Electrode

attacks.name: Energy Bomb
attacks.text: Take all Energy cards attached to Dark Electrode and attach them to your Benched Pokémon (in any way you choose). If you have no Benched Pokémon, discard all Energy cards attached to Dark Electrode.

flavorText: Some researchers hypothesize that Electrode may actually be a form of energy instead of having an actual body.

strengths: Energy Bomb transfers energy to benched Pokemon
Can accelerate setup for benched attackers

competitiveHistory: Dark Electrode was an interesting support Pokemon. Energy Bomb allowed you to attack and then transfer all energy to benched Pokemon, potentially setting up a bigger attacker. However, losing your energy investment made it situational.

rulings.ruling: You must distribute all Energy cards to Benched Pokemon if you have any. You can choose how to split them.
If you have no Benched Pokemon, all Energy is discarded.
